headline: Did Citizens Financial Group's (CFG) Preferred Stock Redemption Signal a Shift in Its Capital Allocation Strategy?
summary: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. has announced it will redeem all 400,000 outstanding shares of its 5.650% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series F, at US$1,000 per share, with the final dividend already declared and payable separately. This redemption alters Citizens' capital structure and dividend obligations, potentially affecting the company's flexibility for capital deployment and future funding strategies. We'll examine how this preferred stock redemption could...
